# Agent Skills Index
URL_TEMPLATE: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/{repo}/main/skills/{path}/SKILL.md
COLUMNS: id;repo;path;summary

## CATEGORIES (ROUTING)
- ai-llm: ./llms/categories/ai-llm.txt (800/1853 skills)
- business: ./llms/categories/business.txt (501/501 skills)
- data: ./llms/categories/data.txt (509/509 skills)
- design: ./llms/categories/design.txt (375/375 skills)
- dev: ./llms/categories/dev.txt (800/2183 skills)
- devops: ./llms/categories/devops.txt (761/761 skills)
- other: ./llms/categories/other.txt (237/237 skills)
- product: ./llms/categories/product.txt (157/157 skills)
- productivity: ./llms/categories/productivity.txt (365/365 skills)
- research: ./llms/categories/research.txt (253/253 skills)
- security: ./llms/categories/security.txt (376/376 skills)
- web: ./llms/categories/web.txt (800/1012 skills)

## TOP 500 GLOBAL SKILLS
